oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Glimpses of Nashville, Tennessee: Senate Chamber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An interior view of the Senate Chamber at the Tennessee State Capitol Building. The Tennessee Senate is the upper house of the U.S. state of Tennessee's state legislature, which is known formally as the Tennessee General Assembly. Forms part of Glimpses of Nashville, Tennessee. 1 booklet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
